editorialNotes.standard: Master logos, posters, and invitations in minutes with this easy-to-use app. It’s democratised design, with thousands of templates and almost unlimited ways to customize them.
editorialNotes.short: Thousands of professional templates

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Play ad-free videos with YouTube Premium.
Create videos with ease and express your style with stickers.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Come for the hilarious face filters and cool photo tags–stay for the fact it’s one of the best ways to share memories, maintain friendships, and stay up to date with your go-to websites.
editorialNotes.short: Share the moment.

editorialNotes.standard: A sleek interface and robust tools transform potato-quality images into stunning works of art with a few taps, along with the freedom to experiment without damaging the original photo.

Powered by the same code base that drives the iconic desktop image editor, the iPadOS version adds a customizable interface optimized for touch and Apple Pencil. Explore all that’s new with lessons on masking, composites, and more.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: While we love watching live streams of our favourite games, there’s more than meets the eye. Try the many live animal cams–and even a whole channel dedicated to “happy little trees” painter Bob Ross.
editorialNotes.short: Broadcast, watch, chat and have fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Turn photos into works of art
editorialNotes.standard: Level up your photo and video game with this all-in-one editor and collage maker. Superhcharge snaps with tools, filters, stickers, and more, and discover others doing the same.
editorialNotes.short: Your all-in-one creativity suite for photo editing.

ios.subtitle: A Quick and Pro Video Editor

editorialNotes.standard: With hundreds of templates, mock up and share invites, announcements, social media posts, and more. And with the app’s membership, access a library of fonts and photos, and become a graphic design guru.
editorialNotes.short: Create social-ready graphics using loads of built-in templates and preset sizes.
Create beautiful stop-motion animated movies anywhere.
Banish the blemish! Flaunt your flawless look.
Decorate your memories with stickers or music with this fun editor.
Create your first film with Multi-Touch.
Create high-definition video with an easy-to-control panel, sound effects and more.
Magically crop your photos for stunning creations!
From instant fix-ups to fine-tuned adjustments, everything you need is here.
Arrange photos from your album in stunning layouts using collage, stickers, and funny captions.
Polish your photos by playing around with great tools and filters.
editorialNotes.tagline: Focus on editing like a pro

editorialNotes.short: Digitize your old albums.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: There’s no task too big–or too small–for this robust photo editor. And if you’d rather draw than edit? There’s support for Apple Pencil and an incredible array of basic and advanced illustration tools.

Social media looks so much better with Adobe Premiere Rush. One of our favourite features is one-click auto-duck audio mixing, which does not add quacking noises but rather automatically adjusts the volume of background music during voiceovers.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This isn’t just a set of perfectly made film-emulation presets and editing tools. It’s also a community of millions of creators sharing and discovering their work–and encouraging you to snap your own.
editorialNotes.short: Shoot and edit like a pro

editorialNotes.tagline: Perfect your photos with a touch
editorialNotes.standard: The app that lets you instantly eliminate extraneous elements like unsightly signs or random people in the background, with just a few swipes. It can even remove power lines and–incredibly–fences.
editorialNotes.short: Efficiently remove unwanted content from your photos.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Prisma’s gorgeous pictures are almost too cool for words, but if we had to pick one to describe our 2016 iPhone App of the Year, it’d be “sublime.” Powerful AI re-creates our photos as breathtaking images that really look hand-painted, complete with natural textures and stylish, spontaneous strokes. The only thing more fun than experimenting with the effects is showing off the results to our friends.
editorialNotes.short: Transform photos into art

name: Hik-Connect - for End user
artistName: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd.

editorialNotes.short: Edit your photos to perfection.

editorialNotes.standard: You don’t need lots of time or pro skills to make the most of this ultra-fast, super-intuitive photo editor. Darkroom can access your whole photo library at once, letting you immediately start cropping, adjusting curves and using preset filters or creating your own—until your pics are exactly how you want them.
editorialNotes.short: Edit and manipulate your photos easily with advanced features.

name: Screen Recorder Voice & Video
